name: .PHB File Extension
summary: Learn about .PHB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Phone book file used by Motorola mobile phones; contains contacts, including names, phone numbers, and other address information; used to backup and restore user phone books.

content: PHB files can be created by 1) connecting to a Motorola phone via a USB port, and 2) backing up the phone book using the Motorola Phone Support Tool (PST).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
